turns.content: Deltor rushes to the office, goes past the stern looking guards at the front gate, past the reception and takes the elevator up to the detective floor. He then hastily walks down the hallway to the office of Alexei and opens the door.

As Deltor, you rush to the Knight Errant office building, past the stern-looking guards at the front gate, past the reception and take the elevator up to the detective floor. You hurry down the hallway, your footsteps echoing off the walls as you make your way to Detective Petrov's office.

You reach his door, and without hesitation, you open it. Inside, you find Detective Petrov sitting at his desk, surrounded by papers and file folders. He looks up as you enter, and gestures for you to take a seat. "I've got some information on the case," he says, his voice serious.

You take a seat in front of his desk, leaning forward, eager to hear what he has to say. Detective Petrov begins to explain that he's received information from his informant that the Kaltes Klirren are indeed involved in the murders and they're using a new designer drug that causes hallucinations before the murder. He also shows you the symbol you found, it's the gang's symbol. He also tells you that they have a lead on the whereabouts of the main suspect.

You listen intently, taking in all the information, you can feel your excitement rising as the pieces of the puzzle start to come together. You thank Detective Petrov for his hard work and you both discuss the next steps in the investigation. You both stand up, ready to hit the streets and bring the killer to justice.

Deltor asks Alexei Petrov: "So, who exactly is the main suspect from Kaltes Klirren and where are his whereabouts? What are our next steps?" Knights Errant are the only law enforcement New Berlin has and we are a part of it.

Detective Petrov looks at you and says: "The main suspect is a man named Johann Bauer, he is one of the leaders of the Kaltes Klirren. He has a long criminal record, but this is the first time he's been connected to something as serious as this. Our informant tells us that Bauer is hiding out in one of the abandoned factories on the outskirts of the city, we think he might be manufacturing the drug there as well.

"Our next steps are to gather a team, and raid the factory. We need to catch Bauer and his associates and put a stop to this crime wave. We also need to find any evidence that can connect him to the murders. We need to move fast, before Bauer and his gang have the chance to destroy any evidence or escape."

As part of Knight Errant, you and Detective Petrov are responsible for maintaining law and order in New Berlin. You both are determined to bring Bauer and his associates to justice and put an end to their criminal activities. The two of you quickly make a plan and gather a team, ready to raid the factory and bring Bauer to justice.

Tell me about the layout of those abandoned factories that are the hideout of Johann Bauer and where their location at the outskirts of New Berlin is. Please also elaborate and describe on what the raid plan exactly is and who our raid team consists of. How many people will we have at our disposal? What is their gear?

The abandoned factories on the outskirts of New Berlin are located in an industrial area that has been largely abandoned due to the advancements in technology. The factories are old and run down, with broken windows and graffiti covering the walls. They are large, sprawling buildings with multiple levels, including a basement, and are connected by a network of corridors and staircases. The buildings are made of concrete and steel, with large open spaces and large machinery still present.

The raid plan is to surround the factory and secure the perimeter, while a smaller team moves in to take out any guards and neutralize Bauer and his associates. The team will consist of a mix of uniformed and plainclothes officers, including yourself, Detective Petrov and a team of Knight Errant SWAT team members. The team will be armed with standard Knight Errant gear, including body armor, tactical helmets, and weapons such as automatic rifles and sidearms. The team will also have flashbangs and teargas at their disposal. We'll have around 20-30 officers, including SWAT team members.

The team will also have a medic on standby, in case of injuries. The goal is to move quickly and efficiently, neutralizing any resistance, and securing the factory. The main objective is to capture Bauer and his associates and gather any evidence that can connect them to the murders.
Just before the raid Deltor calls the runner girl to get some more details on Johann Bauer in hope to get more hard evidence from the imminent raid.

As Deltor, you take a moment before the raid to call the runner girl you met at the bar. You explain the situation to her and ask if she has any information on Johann Bauer that could help with the raid. She tells you that she's heard that Bauer is paranoid and always carries a small black book with him, it could contain important information.

You thank her for the information and hang up, relaying the information to Detective Petrov and the team. The team adjusts the plan accordingly, with a priority on capturing the black book. With this new information, the team is more focused and determined to succeed in their mission.

You and the team head out, ready to bring Bauer and his associates to justice and put an end to the crime wave. You're aware that this could be a dangerous operation and that there are always uncertainties, but you are confident in your team's abilities and training.
Deltor puts on his body armor, tactical helmet and his trusty Ares SIGMA-3 and gets ready for the raid.

As Deltor, you prepare for the raid by putting on your body armor and tactical helmet. You check your Ares SIGMA-3, a reliable and powerful semi-automatic handgun, which has served you well in many situations. You take a deep breath and mentally prepare yourself for what's to come.

You join the rest of the team, who are also getting ready. The SWAT team members are checking their weapons, and the uniformed officers are putting on their body armor and helmets. The team is focused, and you can sense the tension in the air.

You do a quick briefing with the team, reminding them of the plan, the layout of the factory, and the objectives. You remind them to be cautious and to prioritize the safety of the hostages, if any. The team nods in understanding, ready to move out. You give the signal and the team moves out, ready to neutralize any resistance and bring Bauer and his associates to justice.

The lighter equipped forces surround the factory and set up a security perimeter without any incidents, so far the operation seems to progress unnoticed by the criminals. Deltor, Petrov and an elite Knights Errant SWAT team infiltrate the factory building. Deltor breaches the door and throws a couple of flashbangs into the vast hall of the abandoned factory that was behind it.

As Deltor, you lead the elite Knights Errant SWAT team along with Detective Petrov, infiltrating the abandoned factory where Bauer and his associates are believed to be hiding. The lighter equipped forces have successfully set up a security perimeter around the factory, and the operation so far is progressing unnoticed by the criminals.

You give the signal, and the team moves out, making their way towards the factory's main entrance. You approach the door, and with a quick motion, you breach it open. You throw a couple of flashbangs into the vast hall of the abandoned factory that lies beyond it, disorienting anyone inside.

The SWAT team moves in quickly, weapons at the ready. You can hear the sound of footsteps and shouting as the team engages any guards or associates that are present. The team moves through the factory, clearing each room, and making their way to the basement where Bauer is believed to be hiding.

You follow closely behind, keeping your weapon at the ready. The factory is dimly lit and filled with debris, making it difficult to see. The team moves quickly and efficiently, neutralizing any resistance they encounter.

As you reach the basement, you can hear the sound of gunfire and shouting. You give the signal, and the team moves in, ready to capture Bauer and his associates and put an end to their criminal activities.

As Deltor, you currently see a dimly lit basement filled with debris and large machinery. The room is filled with the sounds of gunfire and shouting, as your team engages the remaining members of Bauer's gang. You can see members of the SWAT team moving through the room, weapons at the ready, neutralizing any resistance they encounter. You see the gang members trying to fight back, but they are quickly overpowered by the well-trained and heavily armed SWAT team.

You also see that the basement is also used as a lab to produce the designer drug, you can see various chemicals and equipment used for the production of the drug. There are also tables filled with packets of the drug ready to be distributed.

As the last of the resistance is neutralized, you give the signal for the team to move in and secure the area. You keep your weapon at the ready, scanning the room for any remaining threats.
